record.description: Stable dwelling, which had the fire fatal to 6 on October 3 1950, was located behind this apartment house. There is a sub-standard basement apartment at the rear of this building which has the same owners as the stable.
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Curling. Photographer stamp. Metropolitan Housing and Planning Council stamp.
